beta.header: This is a BETA website. Please report bugs to the <discordLink>mmattDonk Discord server</discordLink>.
beta.description: Blacklisted (users, voices, and words) don't work, and fallback voices don't work.

404.title: Has encontrado un espacio secreto.
404.description: Desafortunadamente, esto es tan solo una página de 404. Puede que hayas mal escrito la dirección, o que la página se haya movido a otro URL.
404.link: Devuélveme a la página de inicio.

Landing.heading: The first <gradientText>100%</gradientText> free AI TTS service for <twitchText>Twitch</twitchText>
Landing.description: AI TTS Donations es un servicio gratuito y de código abierto de Texto-a-Voz para Twitch (y otras plataformas). Es el primero de su clase, sin servicios de suscripción, sin complementos y sin anuncios.
Landing.getStartedTooltip: ¡Aún no estamos listos! Apúntate a la lista de correo de abajo.
Landing.getStartedToday: ¿Suena bien? ¡Empieza hoy mismo a utilizar AI TTS Donations de forma gratuita!
Landing.featuresHeading: Features that are <gradientText>unrivaled</gradientText> compared to anything else available.

features.freeDesc: All features in AI TTS Donations are completely free. No fees, and no subscriptions. Simply download, setup, and use. No payments required at all.
features.openSourceDesc: AI TTS Donations is completely open sourced under the 'AGPL-3' licence. You can view the Source Code and contribute to it on the GitHub page.
features.voicesDesc: AI TTS Donations is built using the APIs of Uberduck.ai and Fakeyou.com. This means that you have access to THOUSANDS of public voices on BOTH of these websites, and your audience can use them to create amazing TTS messages.
features.voiceEffectsDesc: AI TTS Donations has the ability to add voice effects and sound effects to your TTS messages. Voice effects can allow your viewer to pitch up/down voices, add reverb, reduce quality, etc.
features.soundEffectsDesc: Sound effects can add a variety of noises to your viewer's TTS messages. Your viewers can create amazing TTS messages using these features.

FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.q1: Where can my viewers learn how to use the new TTS?
FAQ.a1: We have a wiki entry to help your viewers get started with using the new AI TTS syntax. It's available on <githubLink>GitHub</githubLink> and you can use the shortlink (<shortLink>https://mmatt.link/UseTTS</shortLink>) to put in Twitch panels or chat commands.
FAQ.q2: Where can I get help with setting up AI TTS Donations?
FAQ.a2: You can join the <discordLink>Discord server</discordLink> and you can ask your question and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. If you need 1 on 1 support, message "mmatt". Email: <emailLink>matt@mmatt.net</emailLink> or Discord: <discordUserLink>mmatt#0001</discordUserLink>

Landing.dontBelieveDesc: Just look at what streamers say about it.
Landing.testimonyCTA: Are you a streamer that uses AI TTS Donations? Give us a review <link>here!</link>
Landing.emailNotReadyDescription: Todavía no estamos listos para el lanzamiento, pero puedes inscribirte a la lista de correo para que te avisemos cuando lo estemos.
Landing.emailPapertrail: ¿Quieres ver correos antigüos? ¡Chequea el historial de correos en el sitio web personal de mmatt!

Dashboard.sensitiveInfoWarning: ADVERTENCIA: NO MOSTRAR EL ENLACE DEL OVERLAY EN STREAM. CONTIENE INFORMACIÓN SENSIBLE.
Dashboard.ttsOverlayDescription: Aquí es donde se reproducirá su audio de TTS, simplemente copie el enlace, y péguelo en una Fuente del navegador en su software de streaming preferido (como OBS).

configuration.blacklistDescription: Use a new line for every entry. (Example: Forsen <Kbd>Enter</Kbd> Batman)
